thread.title: BRIEF-Caesarstone Announces Raanan Zilberman's Resignation, Appointment Of Yair Averbuch As Interim CEO

title: BRIEF-Caesarstone Announces Raanan Zilberman's Resignation, Appointment Of Yair Averbuch As Interim CEO

organizations.name: appointment of yair averbuch as interim ceo reuters

text: March 22, 2018 / 12:18 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Caesarstone Announces Raanan Zilberman's Resignation, Appointment Of Yair Averbuch As Interim CEO Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 22 (Reuters) - Caesarstone Ltd: * CAESARSTONE ANNOUNCES RAANAN ZILBERMAN’S RESIGNATION AND APPOINTMENT OF YAIR AVERBUCH AS INTERIM CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER * CAESARSTONE - OPHIR YAKOVIAN, CO’S INCOMING CFO, WILL TRANSITION TO HIS NEW ROLE IN COMING WEEKS AS PLANNED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
